item.title: Work
item.description: Current Measuring material losses in superconducting quantum circuits using coplanar waveguide microwave resonators This summer, I am working on a research project in the intersection of physics and materials science. My final goal is improve the coherence time of superconducting qubits, a particular type of building block for quantum computers. To achieve that, I am investigating devices called microwave resonators. Qubits make use of superconducting microwave resonators to communicate, and understanding those can help us understand superconducting qubits too.
